reasoning: This is a straightforward menu configuration change in the frontend. The task involves removing a single menu item (/analytics) from the navigation, with no backend changes, integrations, or infrastructure modifications required.

scope.notes: Only the navigation/menu configuration file in the frontend needs modification. The actual analytics pages remain intact.

integrations.notes: No external integrations involved. This is purely a UI navigation change.

infrastructure.notes: No infrastructure changes required. The change is confined to frontend menu configuration.

knowledge.notes: The project uses React with react-router-dom. Standard navigation patterns already exist in the codebase.

risk.notes: Very low risk change. Only hides a menu item, does not delete functionality. The /analytics page and route will still work if accessed directly.

validation_recommendations.reasoning: Simple menu configuration change with no security implications. Minimal validation with existing unit tests if present. Only need to verify the menu item is hidden and /bank-transactions-analytics remains accessible.
